com.ibm.jaggr.core.impl.layer

Class LayerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.jaggr.core.impl.layer.LayerBuilder

  • public class LayerBuilder
extends Object
    Layer builder class used to aggregate the output from the list of ModuleBuildFutures into the response stream.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • hasErrors

        protected boolean hasErrors()
        Returns true if any of the module builds indicated an error
        Returns:
        true if there was an error in one of the module builds

      • processFuture

        protected void processFuture(ModuleBuildFuture future,
                 StringBuffer sb)
                      throws IOException
        Adds the reader associated with the future, together with any transport contributions, to the response aggregation.

        If the ModuleBuildReader obtained from the future specifies either before or after modules, then those modules are processed by recursively calling this function.

        Parameters:
        future - The module build future
        sb - Output - the output buffer to write the processed future to
        Throws:
        IOException

      • addTransportContribution

        protected void addTransportContribution(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                            IHttpTransport transport,
                            StringBuffer sb,
                            IHttpTransport.LayerContributionType type,
                            Object arg)
        Appends the layer contribution specified by type (contributed by the transport) to the string buffer.
        Parameters:
        request - The http request object
        transport - The transport object
        sb - The string buffer to append to
        type - The layer contribution type
        arg - The argument value (see IHttpTransport.contributeLoaderExtensionJavaScript(String)

      • collectFutures

        protected List<ModuleBuildFuture> collectFutures(com.ibm.jaggr.core.impl.layer.ModuleList moduleList,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                          throws IOException
        Dispatch the modules specified in the request to the module builders and collect the build futures returned by the builders into the returned list.
        Parameters:
        moduleList - The list of modules in the layer
        request - The request object
        Returns:
        The list of ModuleBuildFuture objects.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • notifyLayerListeners

        protected String notifyLayerListeners(ILayerListener.EventType type,
                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                          IModule module)
                               throws IOException
        Calls the registered layer listeners.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of notification (begin or end)
        request - The request object.
        module - the associated module reference, depending on the value of type.
        Returns:
        The string to include in the layer output
        Throws:
        IOException
